== Mini Labels ==

An in detail description of mini labels will be distributed with releases. A similar description can also be found in the help pages to the GUI app **KMSTrans**. All this information will find its way here, shortly...

Among the new mini labels in the coming release are:

* fotm - Faroe Transverse Mercator.
* webmrc - Web Mercator.
* fcs - Fehmarn projection.
